import math

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

print(math.ceil(n / x) * t)
import math
n, x, t = map(int, input().split())
print(math.ceil(n / x) * t)

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

if n % x == 0:
    print(t * (n // x)
else:
    print(t * (n // x + 1))
import math
n,x,t = map(int,input().split())

print(math.ceil(n/x)*t)

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

print(t * (n // x + (n % x > 0)))
